title: Piercing Undead
description: On a romantic getaway, a husband and wife skip the beginning of the infection. After their vacation a stop for gas serves as a rude introduction to the undead. The couple makes their way to a race track. There they meet up and with the driver of a racing team. Together they escape more than just the undead while attempting to stay out of the piercing claws of death.
author: T.L. Decay
